CustomField.description: Numeric value of Nurse Recommendation Where. Used to compare against System Where.
CustomField.formula: CASE( VCC_Logistical_Recommendation_WHERE__c , '911',7, 'ED Other',7, 'ED VA',7, 'Urgent Non-VA',6, 'Urgent VA',6, 'Appointment',5, 'Clinic/VAMC',5, 'Dentist',4, 'Telephone Visit',3, 'Virtual Video Visit',3, 'Home Care',2, 1)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Numeric value of Nurse Recommendation Where.
CustomField.label: Nurse Where Value
